og.title: Nostalgic
og.description: Revive classic web features for modern sites

features.title: Counter
features.description: Display total, today, yesterday, weekly, and monthly visitor counts. A 90s classic fully recreated.

features.title: Like Button
features.description: Track and display 'likes' per page. Simple API for easy integration.

features.title: BBS
features.description: Classic bulletin board functionality. Enable visitor-to-visitor communication.

features.title: Ranking
features.description: Show page popularity rankings. Compare multiple pages at once.

features.title: Lucky Cat
features.description: Waving lucky cat widget. Bring good fortune to your site with a playful touch.
